Interface IProjectService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProjectService
public interface IProjectService
Service interface for project-related operations. Follows Interface Segregation Principle by providing a focused contract.

  • Method Details

    • getAllProjects

      List<Project> getAllProjects()
      Gets all projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all projects

    • getVisibleProjects

      List<Project> getVisibleProjects()
      Gets all visible projects.
      Returns:
      A list of all visible projects

    • getProjectById

      Optional<Project> getProjectById(int projectId)
      Gets a project by its ID.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the project if found, empty otherwise

    • getProjectsByNeighborhood

      List<Project> getProjectsByNeighborhood(String neighborhood)
      Gets projects by neighborhood.
      Parameters:
      neighborhood - The neighborhood to search for
      Returns:
      A list of projects in the specified neighborhood

    • getProjectsByFlatType

      List<Project> getProjectsByFlatType(String flatType)
      Gets projects that have a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to search for (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      A list of projects offering the specified flat type

    • getProjectsByManager

      List<Project> getProjectsByManager(String managerNric)
      Gets projects managed by a specific HDB manager.
      Parameters:
      managerNric - The NRIC of the manager
      Returns:
      A list of projects managed by the specified manager

    • getProjectsByOfficer

      List<Project> getProjectsByOfficer(String officerNric)
      Gets projects that a specific HDB officer is assigned to.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      A list of projects the officer is assigned to

    • getProjectsByApplicationPeriod

      List<Project> getProjectsByApplicationPeriod(LocalDate date)
      Gets projects with application periods that include the specified date.
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check
      Returns:
      A list of projects with application periods that include the specified date

    • updateVisibility

      boolean updateVisibility(int projectId, boolean isVisible)
      Updates the visibility of a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      isVisible - The new visibility status
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • updateAvailableUnits

      boolean updateAvailableUnits(int projectId, String flatType, int units)
      Updates the available units for a specific flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      flatType - The flat type to update (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      units - The new number of available units
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise

    • bookUnit

      boolean bookUnit(int projectId, String flatType)
      Books a unit of the specified flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      flatType - The flat type to book (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      true if a unit was successfully booked, false otherwise

    • getEligibleProjects

      List<Project> getEligibleProjects(int age, String maritalStatus)
      Gets projects that match the eligibility criteria for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      age - The age of the applicant
      maritalStatus - The marital status of the applicant
      Returns:
      A list of projects that match the eligibility criteria

    • hasAvailableUnits

      boolean hasAvailableUnits(int projectId, String flatType)
      Checks if a project has available units for a specific flat type.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      flatType - The flat type to check (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      true if the project has available units for the specified flat type, false otherwise

    • getBookedUnits

      int getBookedUnits(int projectId, String flatType)
      Gets the number of booked units for a specific flat type in a project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      flatType - The flat type to check (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      Returns:
      The number of booked units
